mapper.select: select DISTINCT collecting.barcode,collecting_dt,collector_id,collecting.prescribe_code, prescribe.status_code, order_slip.order_code,order_slip.vessel_code, visit.patient_no, vessel.sample_code, collecting.cancel_barcode_dt,collecting.cancel_collecting_dt, inspection_status.status_name, user.user_name from collecting join user on collecting.collector_id = user.user_id join prescribe on collecting.prescribe_code = prescribe.prescribe_code join visit on prescribe.visit_code = visit.visit_code join inspection_status on prescribe.status_code = inspection_status.status_code join order_slip on prescribe.order_code = order_slip.order_code join vessel on order_slip.vessel_code = vessel.vessel_code where collecting.barcode = #{barcode} and (prescribe.status_code = 'C' or prescribe.status_code = 'S') and collecting.cancel_barcode_dt is null and collecting.cancel_collecting_dt is null;

select DISTINCT unsuitable_status_code,collecting.prescribe_code from collecting left join unsuitable_status_management on collecting.barcode = unsuitable_status_management.barcode left join unsuitable_reason on unsuitable_status_management.unsuitable_reason_code = unsuitable_reason.unsuitable_reason_code where collecting.barcode = #{barcode}
